thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Terry B
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Terry B

author: Terry B
title: Terry B
text: A long hire (42 days), picking up in Auckland and dropping off in Christchurch. We chose Omega based on their good prices and excellent reviews. Expected a car a few years old, but were provided with a brand new Toyota Corolla, which gave no trouble on our 4000km tour. The Omega staff at both locations were friendly, efficient and helpful. No hassle, no hidden extras - altogether a great stress-free experience.Thank you for a wonderful service.
